heading.role: Systems and Computer Engineering & Software Developer

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Johan is a software developer focused on full stack web development. He finds satisfaction and fun in the programming process, where he enjoys tackling challenges, solving problems and building applications from planning and design to implementation, hoping to make his knowledge available to society and make a better place for everyone.

bioItems.title: Systems and Computer Engineering
bioItems.description: Completed the degree in Systems and Computer Engineering at the Universidad Tecnol√≥gica de Pereira, recognized as a distinguished student by the academic program. Where he learned about Data Structures, Computer Architecture, Software Engineering, Different Programming Paradigms among many other areas of computer science knowledge.

bioItems.title: Software Development Intern at Accedo
bioItems.description: Collaborated in the creation of enterprise web applications through teamwork and agile methodologies. Working with technologies such as Laravel, Vue.js, React Native and Git.

bioItems.title: Web Development
bioItems.description: Started his journey in web development using Node.js and React and learning about API's, HTTP protocol and databases.

bioItems.title: The Beginning
bioItems.description: Wrote his first line of code in collage using Racket Language without understanding much of what he was doing and not realizing the world of possibilities in front of him.

likes.title: I
likes.content: Music, Video Games, Learning Japanese and Playing Soccer
